mapper.insert: insert into hms_member(name, tel, email, profile_photo, password, nickname, post_no, basic_address, detail_address, authority, birth) values(#{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{profilePhoto}, sha2(#{password},256), #{nickname}, #{postNo}, #{basicAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{authority}, #{birth})
mapper.select: select member_id, name, tel, email, profile_photo, nickname, post_no, basic_address, detail_address, birth, created_date, authority from hms_member order by member_id desc
select member_id, name, tel, email, nickname, post_no, basic_address, detail_address, birth from hms_member where member_id=#{no}

select member_id, name, tel, email, profile_photo, nickname, post_no, basic_address, detail_address, authority, birth, created_date from hms_member where email = #{email} and password = sha2(#{password},256)
select member_id, name, tel, email, profile_photo, nickname, post_no, basic_address, detail_address, authority, birth, created_date from hms_member where email = #{email}
mapper.update: update hms_member set nickname=#{nickname}, post_no=#{postNo}, basic_address=#{basicAddress}, detail_address=#{detailAddress}, email=#{email}, password=sha2(#{password},256), tel=#{tel} where member_id=#{no}
